name: Romance
description: Experience the joy and heartache of love with these touching romance dramas.

name: Comedy
description: Laugh out loud with these hilarious comedy dramas that are sure to tickle your funny bone.

name: Thriller
description: Get your heart racing with these intense thriller dramas that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

name: Fantasy
description: Escape to another world with these imaginative fantasy dramas that take you on extraordinary adventures.

name: Action
description: Get your adrenaline pumping with these action-packed dramas that will keep you hooked.

name: Horror
description: Experience the thrill and fear with these spine-chilling horror dramas that will keep you up at night.

name: Sci-Fi
description: Explore the unknown and imagine the impossible with these captivating sci-fi dramas.

name: Mystery
description: Unravel the secrets and solve the puzzles with these intriguing mystery dramas that will leave you guessing.
